entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Moosonee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:23 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -29.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Moosonee Airport 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -29.9°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -33.7°C
Wind: S 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning then periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
